name: Cloak
description: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
additionalInfo: Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources
Increases most heroes' magic resistance to 40%
With the magic resistance bonus from this source, every 10 points of intelligence further increases the total magic resistance by 0.8%
trivia: In DotA, this item is called Planeswalker Cloak. The reason for why it was changed to Cloak in Dota 2 is unknown
In earlier versions, this item was named Cloak of the Magus, and even early, it was named Magus' Cloak

recentChanges.description: Increased magic resistance bonus from 15% to 20%. Increased gold cost from 500 to 800. Now builds into Eternal Shroud and Pipe of Insight.
